title: Stand Ups Paddle Boat Tours
timeLong: 2 hour tour anytime between  9:30am – 4:30pm 7 days a week
body: Experience the sites of the historical Stearn's Wharf Pier, wild marine life, and the gorgeous cliffs of Santa Barbara with our Stand Up Paddle Board tours. Take a look at the ocean from a new perspective with one of our 2 hour long excursions. These exciting activities can be done on weekends as part of a public tour or scheduled as a private tour any day of the week between 9:30am and 4:30pm. These tours come with all the necessary equipment and launch from the Santa Barbara Harbor. Give us a call to book your Stand Up Paddle Board experience today!
